Why this System is unique.

First of all, 1GARD 's International Access Program is uniting Web and real life. This circumstance allows to apply new System in the regular trading operations & web trading both. This System is oriented to business. There is no geographical, national, social, economical and others limits to be the member and to get the personal Access Card .

Your company can use Member's advantages & opportunities by being a Member and giving the discounts or access to free services to the holders of 1GARD Card by minimum rate 1%. 1GARD 's discount rate vary from 1% to 20% on Member's decision.
We do not take a payment for membership in the MARKETCHART sm Access Program .
Members know absolutely what their target audience is, what demographic and statistics on customer groups are.

1GARD reserves the right to itself to process the Account (Card) bearer's information for the analysis of the market situation, demographic, industry situation in general. This circumstance allows to define a positions of the company-participant (Member) in comparison with whole market sector and the circulation of audiences. All transaction's analysis of the certain company-participant are given only to this company, are not transferred to the third part.
You receive the complete report describing group of your real clients (bearers of 1GARD Card) Immediately after achievement of control date.
During time (not at once) you can start to receive the Circulation Report describing flows of the clients. The statistics of the new (acquired) clients, constant clients, lost clients will be included in this report. You will see the dynamic situation by reading ours reports every month.

The experts in marketing will tell that such data are expensive and very difficultly to collect . But using 1GARD marketing technology you spend 1% of income by giving discount. If percentage of 1GARD Card bearers is 5% then your real expenses are 0.05% of gross sales. Ask your marketing department how much money your company spends collecting and processing such data at the present time. You must admit, that 1GARD System is incomparable with the similar researches by others ways. | Top |


The accuracy

The accuracy of the reports depends on many factors. One of them is amount 1GARD Card bearers in every market segment.
Actually it will be enough 1% level. We intend to raise it up to 5% on selected Markets till 2002.
The second factor is the period of time the company accept 1GARD Card. Longer period of 1GARD Card acceptance will initiate more accuracy. There is no commercial risks to start up your company's membership now. All you need to do is to read agreement and declare your company or organization as a Member of MARKETCHART sm International Access Programby registration. Your announcement to your audience will be useful action. It will stimulate the rising of the percentage of account holders.
The third factor of accuracy is human's self-esteem. That's why we make an emphasis on the collection of data based on facts.
We estimate accuracy of information given by Account Holder up to 90% and more. |Top|

Verification

Processing center supports on-line and off-line verifications of 1GARD Access Card.
on-line verification verify existence of account by special secret words (user name & password) via Internet and creates statistic records in Data Base. This way is perfect for web based shops, stores, paid services.

Your web master have to add verification line:

 5%
your 1GARD account


Off-line verification.
Step 1: 1GARD Member's representative makes sure that plastic 1GARD Access Card exists physically.
Step 2: Representative have to copy embossed card number. After these procedures, representative can make 1GARD discount. Collected card's numbers must be sent to Processing center by web based Member's access or by e-mail. Fax message processing is paid service (US$ 0.10 per one number record).
